name: Makima (Chainsaw Man) LoRA
description:
Makima (Chainsaw Man) LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

The main trigger word is MakimaCSM. The weight should be ~1.2, and the CFG should be 7-9.

recommended (model= AbyssOrangeMix3/NeverEnding Dream, weight=1.2 and CFG=7)
